item.title: Configuration
item.description: Global site parameters On top of Hugo global configuration, Dot lets you define the following parameters in your config.toml (here, values are default). Note that some of these parameters are explained in details in other sections of this documentation. # base URL place here baseURL = "https://examplesite.com" # this is your site title title = "Hugo documentation theme" # theme should be `godocs` theme = "godocs" # disable language from here disableLanguages = ["fr"] # now franch language is disabled # add css plugin [[params.
